name: Blacklist-twitter
tagline: removes tweets that contain blacklisted content
body:
Blacklist-Twitter ================= Removes tweets from your timeline that contain blacklisted content (a list of things you don't want to see). Because the Internet lets you customize your experience the way the real world doesn't.

Add the words you want to block to **blacklist.txt**. It removes tweets that match any of the words in the file. ####to-do: * take user input from popup.html
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
